verbose_text: For instance, in the hippocampus, the first identified member of the Shisa family, SHISA9 (CKAMP44), was shown to cause fast and strong desensitization of AMPAR currents, whereas SHISA6 and SHISA7 were reported to decrease the rates of deactivation and desensitization of AMPARs.
evidence: SHISA6 and SHISA7 were reported to decrease the rates of deactivation and desensitization of AMPARs
